name: home
story: One day, you wake up at home and want to go on Wonderland Amusement Park
nav: press 2 to go to the parking lot, press 3 to go to ticket counter, press 20 to go to WonderLand's technical room

name: parking lot
story: You are in the parking lot
nav: press 1 to go back home,  press 3 to go ticket counter, press 17 to go to cafeteria

name: ticket counter
story: From ticket counter, get your tickets and enjoy your journey
nav: press 1 to go back home, press 2 to go to parking lot, press 4 to go to drop tower

name: drop tower
story: you are in drop tower room, careful!! This ride can be dangerous and you need doctor's help if you have health issues
nav: press 1 to go to back to home, press 6 to go to the mysterious room, press 7 to go to movie room

name: doctor's clinic
story: you are in doctor'clinic. Get first aid and relax
nav: press 1 to go to back to home,press 7 to go to the movie room, press 8 to go to coffee shop.

name: Mysterious chamber
story: You are in mysterious chamber. Here you will experience surprises. You may encounter with 3 random events that is 10% chance of having sandwich to boost energy, 20 %chance to encounter a menacing creature in this room and 2 % chanceto find a bag of gold
nav: press 1 to go to back to home, press 9 to goto the Dragon ride,  press 10 to go to Badminton court

name: movie room
story: You are at the movie room, you can check your fav show's episodes
nav: press 1 to go to back to home, press 2 to go to parking lot,  press 8 to go to coffee shop

name: coffee shop
story: You are in coffee shop, have some coffee.
nav: press 1 to go to back to home, press 9 to go to dragon ride, press 10 to go to the badminton court

name: Dragon ride
story: you are in the waitng row to have dragon ride.
nav: press 1 to go to back to home, press 11 to eat chicken,press 10 to go to Badminton court

name: Badminton court
story: you are in the badminton court, play and enjoy it.
nav: press 1 to go to back to home, press 7 to go to the movie room,press 11 to eat chicken.

name: Eat chicken
story: You are going to eat chicken, have some food.
nav: press 1 to go to back to home, press 12 to go to the Live show  ,press 13 to go to the Ice Skating Ring

name: Live show
story: You are in live show area, enjoy !!
nav: press 1 to go to back to home, Press 18 to go to  game zone,    press 8 to go to coffee shop

name: Ice skating ring
story: You are visiting the Ice Skating Ring
nav: press 1 to go to back to home, Press 14 to go to the Dark trading room, Press 15 to go to the monster truck ride

name: Dark trading room
story: You found yourself in trading room  and there is darkness around you. So you need do buy and sell items to get out of this room, also need to interact with gambler and merchant
nav: press 1 to go to back to home,Press 15 to go to the monster truck ride,  Press 20 to go to theWonderLand's technical room

name: monster truck ride
story: You decide to visit the monster truck ride
nav: press 1 to go to back to home, press 16 to go to the waterpool ride and press 18 to go to the game zone

name: waterpool ride
story: You are in the waterpool ride.
nav: press 1 to go to back to home, 2 to go back to parking lot, 17 to go to Cafeteria

name: Cafeteria
story: You are in Cafeteria
nav: Press 1 to go back to home, 18 to go back to Game zone, 19 to go to play Area

name: Game zone
story: You are in game zone, play shot the target to win prices.
nav: press 1 to go to back to home, press 19 to go to play Area, press 20 to go to WonderLand's technical room

name: play Area
story: You have shot the target and won a price.

name: WonderLand's technical room
story: You are not authorized to be here you lose, You will be thrown out of wonderLand park!
